images.caption: Figure 1:The general reasoning capability is significantly improved when we apply VeriFree to fine-tune Qwen3 base models on a general reasoning dataset. Notably, VeriFree can perform on par with or even surpass the instruct models and models RL-tuned from base with a specialized LLM as a verifier.

Figure 2:VeriFree enables R1-Zero-style LLM training without requiring access to a verifier. In the case of a single correct answer format, VeriFree optimizes exactly the same objective as R1-Zero with a lower variance gradient estimator.
